definition: eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)
to believe what one sees, not what one hears (idiom). Don't believe what people tell you until you see if for yourself./It ain't necessarily so.
pinyin: yan3 jian4 wei2 shi2 , er3 ting1 wei2 xu1

definition: Take what you hear to be false, only believe it when you see it (idiom). Don't believe what people tell you until you see if for yourself./It ain't necessarily so.
pinyin: er3 ting1 wei2 xu1 , yan3 jian4 wei2 shi2
